headline: Elavon Wins Multiple Top Payment Gateway Awards
summary: ATLANTA, February 11, 2026--Elavon, a wholly owned subsidiary of U.S. Bank and one of the world's largest payment processors, is proud to be recognized with several performance honors in the 2026 Real Transaction Metrics Awards presented by TSG, a globally recognized analytics, intelligence, and solutions-focused firm serving the payments ecosystem. These awards highlight payment gateways that consistently deliver excellence across the performance areas that matter most to merchants and their cu
